title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) etc.
OB: The All types dialog displays obfuscated classes with names like 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd', etc.
EB: Obfuscated classes should be less prominent or filtered out completely in the All types dialog.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the All types dialog in the JDK 1.4 environment.
2. Navigate through the list of classes and observe the presence of obfuscated class names.
